turns.user_message: Need a train leaving on Thursday after 14:30
turns.agent_response: I found 195 trains that match your prerequisites. What is your destination?
turns.reasoning: First turn - user starts Goal 1: finding a train. Agent asks appropriate follow-up.

turns.user_message: I am going to London Liverpool Street from Cambridge.
turns.agent_response: Train TR3237 arrives at 17:27 and cost 16.60 pounds. Would you like me to book it?
turns.reasoning: Continuing train discussion (Goal 1). Agent provides specific train option.

turns.user_message: No thanks, I'm not sure how many seats I'll be needing yet.
turns.agent_response: Okay. Just call us back when you do.
turns.reasoning: Still discussing train booking (Goal 1). User declines booking, agent acknowledges.

turns.user_message: Oh, I am also looking for an African restaurant in the centre...North African, to be exact.
turns.agent_response: There aren't any in that particular area, do you have any alternative preferences?
turns.reasoning: User switches to Goal 2: finding African restaurant. Clear topic switch with 'I am also looking for...'

turns.user_message: Hmm, can you see if there might be an expensive restaurant that serves specifically "north african" food in the centre of town?
turns.agent_response: I apologize, but we are don't have any North African restaurants in this town at all. I do have an expensive African restaurant in the centre. Will that suffice?
turns.reasoning: Still discussing African restaurant (Goal 2). User refines search criteria.

turns.user_message: No, if I can't get North African I'd really prefer something radically different. Chinese, maybe?
turns.agent_response: How about the Ugly Duckling? They serve chinese food and are located in the centre of the city.
turns.reasoning: Same restaurant goal, user adjusts preferences to Chinese. Agent suggests Ugly Duckling.

turns.user_message: Okay. can you book me a table for 7 at 11:00 for Thursday?
turns.agent_response: That booking was unsuccessful. Would you like to try another time?
turns.reasoning: Same restaurant goal. Booking attempt fails - agent unable to secure requested time.

turns.user_message: Sure, can we try for 10:00 instead?
turns.agent_response: Booking for 10:00 was successful. Your reference number is XVUUCPBH. Is there anything else I can help with?
turns.reasoning: Same restaurant goal. Alternative time booking succeeds.

turns.user_message: That will be all, thank you very much.
turns.agent_response: You're welcome. Have a great day!
turns.reasoning: Conversation closing, no new goal. Agent provides appropriate farewell.
